You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &swarr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&swArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d9/index.htm U+021D9].
  * `&swarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2199/index.htm U+02199].
